c74object.name: abc.hoa.stereodecoder~
c74object.digest: Abclib's 2D High Order Ambisonics (HOA) Stereo Decoder
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.stereodecoder~ enable to decode from ambisonic spatial components to stereo
- gain is the output gain in dB
- directangles is 1 for anticlockwise (as in ambisonic norm) and 0 for clockwise

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1:min=1:max=7:step=1].

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: sets the output gain in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the output gain in dB

attribute.name: directangles
attribute.description: sets direction of encodage angle between clockwise and couterclockwise, true is anti-clockwise, false is clockwise [init=1:min=0:max=1:step=1].

method.name: gain
method.description: sets the output gain in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the output gain in dB

method.name: directangles
method.description: sets direction of encodage angle between clockwise and couterclockwise, true is anti-clockwise, false is clockwise [init=1:min=0:max=1:step=1].
